title: Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park: North Rim
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping     North Rim                North Rim Campground       North Rim Campground is located approximately 16 miles southwest of Crawford, CO. The last 7 miles of North Rim Road are unpaved.   All sites are shaded within a Pinyon-Juniper forest. North Rim Campground often fills during spring and fall, and occasionally fills during summer months. All sites are available on a first-come, first-served basis and have a maximum 14 consecutive day stay in a 30 day period. A maximum of 8 people and 2 vehicles are allowed per site. RVs greater than 35 feet are not recommended. Generator use is allowed within designated hours.
